statements: SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY last_visit_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, treatment_plan FROM patients WHERE age <= 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patients WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY last_visit_date ASC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY last_visit_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, gender, last_visit_date FROM patients WHERE treatment_plan IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_name ASC, last_visit_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis, treatment_plan, last_visit_date FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY last_visit_date
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT full_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Oncologists ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT oncologist_id, full_name, specialization FROM Oncologists WHERE specialization = 'Oncology';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' OR gender = 'Female';
SELECT full_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT full_name, age, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE full_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, specialization, email FROM Oncologists WHERE specialization = 'Oncology' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT p.full_name, o.full_name, o.email FROM Patients p JOIN Oncologists o ON p.age > 40 AND o.specialization = 'Oncology';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT oncologist_name, specialty, hospital FROM Oncologists WHERE specialty = 'Oncology';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' LIMIT 10;
SELECT ONC.oncologist_name, MR.record_date, MR.treatment FROM MedicalRecords MR JOIN Oncologists ONC ON MR.oncologist_id = ONC.oncologist_id WHERE ONC.specialty = 'Oncology';

SELECT patient_name, age, ONC.oncologist_name, MR.record_date FROM Patients P JOIN MedicalRecords MR ON P.patient_id = MR.patient_id JOIN Oncologists ONC ON MR.oncologist_id = ONC.oncologist_id WHERE P.age < 30;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 40;
SELECT MAX(patient_age) AS oldest_patient_age FROM Patients;
SELECT oncologist_name, specialty FROM Oncologists ORDER BY oncologist_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT oncologist_name, specialty, contact_number FROM Oncologists WHERE specialty = 'Oncology';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, last_visit FROM Patients ORDER BY last_visit DESC;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_type, appointment_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT oncologist_name, specialty, years_of_experience FROM Oncologists ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, report_date, report_text FROM MedicalReports WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT oncologist_name, specialty, years_of_experience FROM Oncologists ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_text FROM MedicalReports WHERE LENGTH(report_text) > 500;
